channel.title: Imageshack difficulties
channel.description: when i advertise my server i take some cool photographs of my server, click browse on image shack and click my screenie, click the 21 inch monitor size but when it hosts it it goes really small, as when i post the url on mopar too! how do i make it perfect size?[br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2007, 01:19:22 PM[/size][hr]anyone? i'm sure you guys have great servers and have hosted pictures via imageshack before, please tell me :(

item.title: Imageshack difficulties
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

It makes it smaller because of the amount of bytes if data it takes up. I have no clue why they offer those
